name: Shanghai Jiaotong University(SJTU)
description:
Shanghai Jiaotong University, founded in 1896, is one of the most time-honored and internationally renowned universities in China, distinguished by its variety and excellence of academic programs.

Much more details: http://en.sjtu.edu.cn/about-sjtu/overview/
